directions: Heat olive oil in heavy medium saucepan over medium heat. Add garlic, cumin, and chipotle chile powder; stir 1 minute. Add wine and simmer 2 minutes. Stir in ketchup, vinegar, soy sauce, and liquid smoke; simmer 2 minutes longer. (Can be prepared 2 days ahead. Cover and refrigerate.)
*Available in the spice section of most supermarkets.
**A smoke-flavored liquid seasoning available at specialty foods stores and many supermarkets.
ingredients: 1/4 teaspoon ground chipotle chile pepper powder*
title: Red Wine Barbecue Sauce
